name: Alset - Study Prototype
description:
This game prototype is part of a study we are conducting as part of our candidate thesis. Due to Covid-19 we are unable to perform tests on location, so we would greatly appreciate if you want to help us with this study!

We will not disclose beforehand exactly what we are researching, since it would compromise the integrity of the collected data. We will however explain all of this after the study is done. :)

Instructions
Download the game and read the README.txt file before playing. It should contain all instructions you need to take part of this test. You can play for however long you want, but you are not required to finish the entire demo. You can quit whenever you want. After you've played you get to fill out a short survey, which should take around 5-10 minutes.

It is highly recommended to play with an Xbox controller! 

Development
If you are interested in the full game called Alset, please follow the development in one of these places!
Twitter: @subfrost_games
Reddit: r/Alset
Facebook: @alsetgame
Website & Newsletter: subfrostinteractive.com
